SEARCH
Package research

Class ResearchDatabase

java.lang.Object
research.ResearchDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ResearchDatabase extends Object implements Serializable
The ResearchDatabase class represents the database for storing research-related entities. It implements the Serializable interface to support serialization.
See Also:
